sentence: Taking a snapshot across a range of sectorsâ€¦ First we take a look at SunPower ( SPWRA ) in the wake of an announced friendly tender offer from Total Group.
We also offer a glimpse into Home Depot's ( HD ) market share outlook as the company pushes forward on new initiatives to build customer satisfaction.
Today's quiz features the cable networks operated by News Corp ( NWS ).
Which network contributes the most to the company's equity value?
Moving into the retail sector, we present our full analysis for Urban Outfitters ( URBN ) stock.
SunPower recently announced that Total Group would soon be launching a friendly tender offer to buy 60% of the solar industry giant's outstanding class A and class B equity shares.
Total's offer of $23.25 per share sparked a surge in SunPower's stock from below $16 to over $20.
We continue to hold our price estimate of $16.22 for SunPower's stock.

Over the past decade, Lowe's has gained significant market share at the expense of Home Depot.
However, in recent years, Home Depot is looking stronger.
Home Depot recently introduced a mobile barcode program that provides access to instant (and relevant) information to help customers make more informed decisions.
Improved customer satisfaction from the service could boost market share.
